lyrics:
You lift my heart up when the rest of me is down (no, n-no)
You, you enchant me even when you're not around (no, n-no)
If there are boundaries, I will try to knock them down (no, n-no)
I'm latching on, babe, now I know what I have found (no, n-no)

I feel we're close enough, I want to lock in your love
I think we're close enough, could I lock in your love, baby?

Now I've got you in my space, I won't let go of you (no, n-no)
Got you shackled in my embrace, I'm latching onto you (no, n-no)
Now I've got you in my space, I won't let go of you (no, n-no)
Got you shackled in my embrace, I'm latching onto you (no, n-no)

I'm so encaptured, got me wrapped up in your touch (no, n-no)
Feel so enamored, hold me tight within your clutch (no, n-no)
How do you do it, you got me losing every breath (no, n-no)
What did you give me to make my heart beat out my chest? (no, n-no)

So close enough, I want to lock in your love
I think we're close enough, could I lock in your love, baby?
I feel we're close enough, I want to lock in your love
I think we're close enough, could I lock in your love, baby?

Now I've got you in my space, I won't let go of you (no, n-no)
Got you shackled in my embrace, I'm latching onto you (no, n-no)
Now I've got you in my space, I won't let go of you (no, n-no)
Got you shackled in my embrace, I'm latching onto you (no, n-no)

I'm latching onto you (I'm latchin' on)
I won't let go of you (I won't let go, no, n-no)
I'm latching onto you (I - won't - let - go)
I won't let go of you (I won't let go, I won't let go, I won't let go...)
